name: Not Without You (itch) (Shapeshifting Rabbits)
description:
Description

You escaped paradise in search of your inseparable soulmate, but now the heavens are furious and have sent their holy light after you!

A project for the GMTK2021 game jam.

Notes:

  • Mac version does not work when downloaded straight from this page. It only works when downloaded through the itch.io app. We apologise that we are unable to provide a fix at this time.
  • Linux version is provided but has not been tested.

Controls

  • A – Move left
  • D – Move right
  • SPACE – Jump

Credits

  • Game Design & programming: Laurie Trichet & Rafael Gonzalez
  • Visual assets (sprites and fonts) by Kenney
  • Music by Muz Station Productions
  • Sound FX by Kenney and Imphenzia
